author: whaughton
title: 11 things we learnt from the weekend’s football: Pep has faith in Jesus, garden of Eden in full bloom and same old Arsenal
text:
EFL 11 things we learnt 11 things we learnt from the weekend’s football: Pep has faith in Jesus, garden of Eden in full bloom and same old Arsenal 
All the fall-out from the weekend's Premier League action as Chelsea take another step towards the title, Klopp fails to stop rot and Leicester raise fears about being dilly gone by Warren Haughton
